content:
* Customers have reported that the grinder creates a lot of mess and waste
* Grinds stick to the cup and fall all over the counter and floor
* Static electricity in the canister causes grinds to stick to the sides
* Difficult to remove the container from the grinder body without spilling grinds
* Some customers have reported that the grinder is fast and quiet
* One customer mention that it can grind coffee beans very well
* However, the main issue customers have reported is the mess and waste that the grinder creates, which seems to outweigh any potential benefits.
